---
title: "Set Up for the Workshop"
author: "Zack W Almquist (University of Minnesota)"
output: html_document
---

In this workshop we will be introducing you to some of the GIS-style capabilities of R and basic introduction to spatial models. We will, also, introduce you to acquiring spatial data online with a focus on [US Census](http://www.census.gov) data. To use the tutorials and other material we will use a combination of [R](https://cran.r-project.org/), [RStudio](http://www.RStudio.com), and [Github](http://www.github.com).
